titles.title: For the relief of Pamela S. Konkel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/18/2003--Introduced. Deems Pamela S. Konkel of Troy, Illinois, a widow who has attained the age of 60 for purposes of the Social Security Act (effective October 31, 2002). States that any widow's insurance benefits to which Ms. Konkel is entitled for the period prior to the enactment of this Act shall be paid in a lump sum.
